```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(Cairo)

source("../../../../theme.R")

windows.options(antialias = "cleartype")
options(device = Cairo::CairoWin)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,fig.width=10, fig.height=7, dev = "svg", dpi = 300, fig.pos = 'H', tidy.opts=list(width.cutoff=60), tidy=TRUE)
```

## About the Data
```{r data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mpi_data = read_xlsx(here("output_data", "MPI_trials.xlsx"))
mpi_data[1:4,] %>% ggplot(aes(x = total_nodes, y = proc_secs)) + 
  geom_smooth(color = color_pal(1, "cool"), size = 1.75) + 
  geom_point(color = color_pal(1, "cool"), size = 3.5)  + 
  labs(title = "Parallelization has Diminishing Returns", x = "MPI Nodes", y = "Running Time (s)") + theme_master(base_size = 22)
```
